'''__System Specs__''' <<BR>>
Intel® Core i5-430M processor <<BR>>
Mobile Intel® HM55 Express Chipset<<BR>>
NVIDIA® GeForce® 310M<<BR>>
Configured with 4GB DDR3 1066MHz<<BR>>
500GB (5400 RPM) Serial ATA hard disk drive<<BR>>
TOSHIBA Hard Drive Impact Sensor (3D sensor)<<BR>>
DVD SuperMulti drive with Labelflash<<BR>>
16.0 diagonal widescreen TruBrite TFT LCD display at 1366 x 768<<BR>>
Premium US keyboard with 10-key<<BR>>
TouchPad pointing device with multi-touch control<<BR>>
TouchPad Enable/Disable button<<BR>>
Media Control Buttons<<BR>>
Webcam and microphone<<BR>>
10/100 Ethernet (Realtek RTL8101E/RTL8102E PCI Express)<<BR>>
Wi-Fi® Wireless networking (802.11b/g/n) (Realtek 8172)<<BR>>
ExpressCard slot<<BR>>
Memory Card Reader<<BR>>
RGB (monitor) output port<<BR>>
HDMI-CEC (REGZA LINK)<<BR>>
S/P DIF output port<<BR>>
i.LINK IEEE-1394<<BR>>
4 USB v2.0 ports (3 USB + 1 eSATA/USB combo with USB Sleep and Charge)<<BR>>

=== Lucid Lynx 64 bit Live CD ===

To get some of the hardware working at boot you need to set options in F6 to "nomodeset" and "noapic" if not you will get a black screen (nomodeset) and no USB ports (noapic).<<BR>>
